ComicInfo.Penciller: Tony Daniel,Tony S. Daniel,Tony S. Daniel
ComicInfo.Summary: Rion is put to the test in an environment surrounded by fear and deception. An old friend returns bearing gifts and a mission that could change the course of the war. Entering Edenwood and rescuing his friends from their dark paths is a non-negotiable before he accepts the suicidal mission from the Witch War Council.
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three: Betrayal
ComicInfo.Writer: Tony Daniel,Tony S. Daniel,Tony S. Daniel
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Leonardo Paciarotti,Marcelo Maiolo,Matteo Scalera,Rafael Albuquerque,Szymon Kudranski,Tony Daniel
